content:
Open source has been the mainstream paradigm for some time now. Although I am a little late to the party with some of my code, I am continuing to open source as much as possible, as quickly as possible. This website is now entirely open source and can be found on github: https://github.com/craigmayhew/craig.mayhew.io.

I've moved away from using mongodb and instead store the blogposts and pages in simple json files (one file per page/post). It's currently at about 230MBs including photos and screenshots.
title: Open Source craig.mayhew.io
